columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure that is associated with this bundleable charge line.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the account that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: ACCT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The account serial number associated with this charge.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether to not bill insurance for this charge. Y indicates that the charge should not be billed to insurance.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The date of service for this charge.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: REQ_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the submitter that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payor that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: FINANCIAL_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The financial class category number for the bundleable charge line record.
entries: Sent to Consolidated Self-Pay Service Area

columns.name: ORDERING_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: PERFORMING_LAB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the performing lab that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: CHARGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The linked charge type category ID for the bundleable charge line.

columns.name: NOT_CHARGE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the reason the charge was voided.

columns.name: NOT_CHARGE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who voided this charge.

columns.name: NOT_CHARGE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: NOT_CHARGE_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment entered by the user who voided this charge.

columns.name: NOT_CHARGE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when this charge was voided.

columns.name: TASK_ID_C_NAME
columns.description: The task category ID that triggered the charge.

columns.name: PERFORMING_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the performing department that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: BILL_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the billing provider that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: SERV_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service provider that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: The unique patient contact series number that is associated with this bundleable charge line record.
